description: This table stores the questionnaire answers for the performables on a panel order.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the ORD_LAB_PERFORM table.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PERF_QUES_ANS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the record used to hold questionnaire answers for the given performable procedure.
